message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I would like to propose a price of $15000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $16500. It's a fair price, considering the value it brings. I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to reach a fair agreement. I would like to propose a price of $14500 for the product. I believe this is a reasonable price considering its value.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $14500. I'm willing to compromise further and offer the product to you for $16000. This is a fair price, considering the value it brings, and I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.
I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I am willing to consider $15500 as a fair price for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal. However, I'm still not willing to go as high as $15500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $16250. This is a fair price, considering the value it brings, and I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. I am willing to consider $15750 as a fair price for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as high as $15750. I'm willing to compromise further and offer the product to you for $16000. This is a fair price, considering the value it brings, and I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product and our previous negotiations, I am willing to agree on a price of $15500 for the product. I hope this final offer will be acceptable to you.
